metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37832 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A SQL injection vulnerability exists in version 3.0.2 of Hotel Druid when SQLite is being used as the application database. A malicious attacker can issue SQL commands to the SQLite database through the vulnerable idappartamenti parameter.

criterions.comment: hoteldruid package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
